hero.title: О нашей команде
hero.subtitle: Мы воплощаем в жизнь самые смелые идеи, создавая захватывающие моменты в кино.

story.title: How We Make the Impossible Happen
story.description: We began as a small group of passionate enthusiasts. Today, we are a leading professional stunt team, pushing the boundaries of what’s possible and ensuring the highest level of safety on set.

aboutus: Our team provides complete stunt solutions — from high-precision choreography to on-set safety supervision — ensuring that every sequence is executed safely, creatively, and at the highest professional standard.
We specialize in challenging environments, supplying trained safety experts and professional equipment for work in extreme locations: mountains, caves, underwater, and in the air.

Kepa Stunts also offers specialized stunt workshops and training programs for students, actors, directors, and industry professionals who want to deepen their skills and understanding of action filmmaking.

values.title: Safety
values.text: The safety of actors and crew is our top priority in every project.

values.title: Innovation
values.text: We use advanced technologies and modern equipment to create unique effects and complex action sequences.

values.title: Creativity
values.text: Every project is an opportunity to craft something new, exciting, and memorable.

values.title: Teamwork
values.text: A cohesive team ensures the success of even the most challenging stunt productions.

teamDescription: Meet the experts who bring cinematic action to life.

storyBlocks.title: Путь к успеху
storyBlocks.text: От первых шагов до крупных проектов мирового уровня — мы гордимся каждой главой нашего роста.

storyBlocks.title: Наше видение
storyBlocks.text: Создавать незабываемые и безопасные трюки, которые становятся культовыми моментами в кино.

cta.title: Готовы реализовать вашу идею?
cta.description: Свяжитесь с нами, чтобы обсудить следующий проект. Мы готовы принять любой вызов и создать незабываемые сцены.
